name: Invygo Limited
description: Developer of a car subscription platform designed to get a car and pay every month and return or upgrade whenever possible without penalties. The company's platform helps users to subscribe and return cars with ease, as well as browse and drive fully insured cars with one payment that includes maintenance, breakdown cover, and concierge assistance, enabling customers to get automobile assistance simply.
one_liner: Developer of a car subscription platform designed to get a car and pay every month and return or upgrade whenever possible without penalties. The company's platform helps users to subscribe and return cars with ease, as well as browse and drive fully insured cars with one payment that includes maintenance, breakdown cover, and concierge assistance, enabling customers to get automobile assistance simply.
